attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please save our sport of banger racing inside the M25 due to Mr Ken Livingstone putting a ban on large lorries with high emissions coming into said area this has jeopardised the sport we love as the drivers can no longer get to the tracks to race.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
